name: 2022 2nd International Conference on Smart City and Green Energy
content: PUBLICATION: Submissions will be reviewed by the conference technical committees, and accepted papers will be published in ICSCGE 2022 International Conference Proceedings by IEEE CPS, which will be included into IEEE Xplore and submitted to major databases like EI Compendex, Scopus, Inspec, etc for indexing. Selected papers with extented version will be published in the International Journal of Smart Grid and Clean Energy, which will be indexed by Inspec, EBSCO, DOAJ, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
